content:
Hello,

I'm curious if anyone knows of any planned tools for testing the CARIN BB IG. Our plan was to utilize Touchstone as they appear to have a group of tests for Patient Access conformance (US Core, Formulary, Provider Directory) . This group of tests seems to be missing anything related to testing EOB and Claims. Does anyone have insight into this?

Thanks

I found that Inferno has an online validator that lets you apply the CARIN BB IG. https://inferno.healthit.gov/validator/ This will at least allow me to prove our resources conform. I'll just have to keep an eye on Touchstone to see if they come up with a more formal test suite in the future.
